nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS terminated_workflows FROM temporalCloudWorkflowTerminate FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS frontend_service_error FROM temporalCloudFrontendServiceError FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace

rawConfiguration.text:
**About**

Instrument Temporal cloud with New Relic - [Add Data](https://one.newrelic.com/)

Follow New Relic [Temporal cloud documentation](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/host-integrations/host-integrations-list/temporal-cloud-integration/) documentation to instrument Temporal cloud.


[Please rate this dashboard](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSclR38J8WbbB2J1tHnllKUkzWZkJhf4SrJGyavpMd4t82NjnQ/viewform?usp=pp_url&entry.1615922415=Temporal_cloud&entry.358368110=https://onenr.io/0dQeLbY0Yje) here and let us know how we can improve it for you.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS resource_exhausted_errors FROM temporalCloudResourceExhaustedErrors FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace SINCE 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS requests FROM temporalCloudFrontendServiceRequest FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS success_polls FROM temporalCloudPollSuccess FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM temporalCloudTotalAction SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Temporal Actions' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM temporalCloudScheduleActionSuccess SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Action Success' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM temporalCloudScheduleBufferOverruns SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Buffer Overruns' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM temporalCloudScheduleMissedCatchupWindow SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Missed Catchup Window' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM temporalCloudScheduleRateLimited SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Rate Limited' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM temporalCloudWorkflowSuccess SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Workflow Success' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM temporalCloudWorkflowTimeout SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Workflow Timeout' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM temporalCloudWorkflowFailed SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Workflow Failed' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM temporalCloudWorkflowContinued SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS 'Workflow Continued' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace TIMESERIES 1 minute SINCE 30 minutes ago

SELECT max(`data.result-value1`) AS state_transition FROM temporalCloudStateTransition FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO TIMESERIES 1 minute

widgets.title: Temporal Cloud Signal Workflow Latency Execution (50%)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT histogram(`data.result-value1`,0.5) AS 'latency_50' FROM temporalCloudServiceLatencyBucket WHERE `data.result-metric-operation` = 'SignalWorkflowExecution' FACET `data.result-metric-operation` AS operation, `data.result-metric-temporal_namespace` AS namespace

SELECT average(cpuPercent) AS `CPU used %` FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(memoryUsedPercent) AS `Memory used %` FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) AS `Storage used %` FROM StorageSample TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(transmitBytesPerSecond) AS `Transmit bytes per second`, average(receiveBytesPerSecond) AS `Receive bytes per second` FROM NetworkSample TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(loadAverageOneMinute) AS `1 minute`, average(loadAverageFiveMinute) AS `5 minutes`, average(loadAverageFifteenMinute) AS `15 minutes` FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT latest(cpuPercent) AS `CPU %`, latest(threadCount) AS `Threads` FROM ProcessSample FACET processId, processDisplayName ORDER BY cpuPercent asc LIMIT 100

nrqlQuery.query: SELECT uniques(`data.result-metric-temporal_namespace`) FROM temporalCloudServiceLatencyCount  SINCE 6 weeks ago
